content: **size** one size **measurements** wingspan 188 cm / 74 center depth 46 cm / 18 **materials** 3 skeins of rainbow bamboo color 21 **needles** circular needle 3 75 mm 80 cm /us 5 32 **yarn quality** rainbow bamboo hobbii 60 % bamboo viscose 40 % cotton 100 g / 3 5 oz = 250 m / 274 yds **gauge** 18 sts x 36 row = 10 cm x 10 cm / 4 x 4 **pattern information** this crescent shawl is the perfect project for adventurous beginners looking to dip their toes into lace knitting or for experienced knitters seeking a relaxing meditative knit worked from the top down the shawl s crescent shape is achieved through yarnover increases on both the right and wrong sides the modern zigzag lace pattern is created using simple yarnovers and decreases making it both engaging and approachable finished with a stretchy bind-off this shawl drapes beautifully and adds a touch of sophistication to any outfit whether you re looking to expand your skills or enjoy a peaceful knitting experience this shawl is a delightful project to add to your collection **find the pattern in more languages here ** german 1 danish 2 swedish 3 norwegian 4 finnish 5 french 6 spanish 7 italian 8 polish 9 dutch
